urls.title: Flooding - updates
urls.description: The Amber weather warning across the whole of the county means communities across the Derbyshire Dales need to be on flood alert over the coming days. Particular areas of concern highlighted by the Environment Agency are Bakewell, Baslow and Matlock. As always, the big message is BE PREPARED - see the advice on our website.

urls.title: Waste Management In Workplace Is A Winnable War For Us All
urls.description: Micros and SMEs are difference makers. Chartered environmentalist Brian Marshall highlights how sound strategies will benefit the ‚Äòbottom line‚Äô and enhance your reputation. Our work/life balance has never been more pivotal. ¬† The essence of ‚ÄòBirdie Business‚Äô is to reinforce that message. ¬† Diverse business topics will be discussed, counter-balanced by a focus on golf, an endeavour that Mark Twain somewhat bizarrely described as ‚Äòa good walk spoiled‚Äô. Strange man! ¬† The cocktail has served Jason White well for many years, and he commends it to all. ¬† His business background is detailed on yourdataandsafetypro.co.uk ¬†

text:
@iemanet @andrefarrar @EnvAgency @SocEnv_HQ 'Waste Management In The Workplace' podcast published today (link below).
My chat with @Brian_Reconomy offers great guidance and advice to micros and SMEs.
Spread the gospel, folks, we can make a difference!
https://t.co/UeSkl4HGpx

urls.title: Flood Alert, Flood Warning and Severe Flood Warning ‚Äì What‚Äôs the difference? | Newground
urls.description: Recently, I saw a poll on Twitter set up to help the Environment Agency understand people‚Äôs interpretation of flood risk, which is one of the reasons I decided to write this blog. Out of the 1,199 people who voted on the poll, I was quite shocked to find that 51% of voters thought a Flood Alert meant that you were at a higher risk of flooding than a Flood Warning. This is NOT the case. Raising awareness of the flood alerts and warning system and what each stage means is key to educating people and

text:
Having a 'trigger' to notify you of a #flood BEFORE it happens can allow time to prepare.
The @EnvAgencyNW Flood Warning Service is one such trigger, but do you know what the different stages mean?

Read our blog to learn more: https://t.co/5Hv1sf3FoV

#preparedness #floodaware https://t.co/P9PIiePqf4
